subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Connecticut has not lost since April 6, 2008, when it was upset by Stanford in the national semifinals. The Huskies can break the record in the Big East tournament semifinals on Monday.
snippet: Connecticut has not lost since April 6, 2008, when it was upset by Stanford in the national semifinals. The Huskies can break the record in the Big East tournament semifinals on Monday.
